title: Department to administer part
context: PART IV. CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL HEALTH NEEDS Note Part heading amended by L 1988, c 4, §1. §321-51 Department to administer [part]. The department of health is designated as the agency of the State to administer a program of services for children with special health needs. [L 1939, c 179, §2; RL 1945, §2102; RL 1955, §46-41; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §19; HRS §321-51; am L 1988, c 4, §2]
